snippet: The arrest of fugitive Eric M. Frein brought relief to northeastern Pennsylvania but it remains a mystery as to how he evaded the authorities for so long.
abstract: Arrest of fugitive Eric M Frein, accused of killing Pennsylvania State Police Trooper Cpl Bryon K Dickson, brings relief to northern Pennsylvania after seven weeks of uneasiness; it remains mystery how Frein evaded authorities for so long.

byline.original: By SEAMUS McGRAW and TRIP GABRIEL
byline.contributor: Seamus McGraw reported from Canadensis, and Trip Gabriel from New York.

lead_paragraph: The arrest of fugitive Eric M. Frein brought relief to northeastern Pennsylvania but it remains a mystery as to how he evaded the authorities for so long.

headline.main: Answers Still Elusive After Arrest of Eric Frein in Killing of a State Trooper
headline.print_headline: Answers Still Elusive After Fugitive’s Arrest in Killing of a State Trooper
